name: Linen Hub Project
description: Designed and led a team to implement the Linen Hub Project, an innovative solution for linen management.

name: High Frequency
description:
Founded and successfully scaled an RFID System Integration Company specializing in end-to-end RFID solutions for commercial applications.

Led the company from inception to acquisition, overseeing product development, business strategy, and market expansion.

Spearheaded innovations in RFID tracking, asset management, and automation, streamlining operations for industries such as logistics, healthcare, and industrial automation.

Established partnerships with key stakeholders, including regulatory bodies and enterprise clients, to drive adoption of RFID technology.

Managed technical teams, developed proprietary software and hardware integrations, and positioned the company as a leader in the RFID space before a successful exit.

name: Patent AU2021221685A1
description: Developed and patented an advanced system for IoT-driven linen management and automation.
